summary.span: 表示一系列相互连接的直线和曲线。

span.span: Represents a series of connected lines and curves.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序使用路径来绘制形状的轮廓、填充形状的内部和创建剪辑区域。Applications use paths to draw outlines of shapes, fill the interiors of shapes, and create clipping regions. 图形引擎在世界坐标空间内维护路径中几何形状的坐标。The graphics engine maintains the coordinates of geometric shapes in a path in world coordinate space. 路径可以包含任意数量的图形（子路径）。A path may be composed of any number of figures (subpaths). 每个图形均由一系列连接的直线和曲线或几何形状基元组成。Each figure is either composed of a sequence of connected lines and curves or a geometric shape primitive. 图的起点是连接直线和曲线序列中的第一个点。The starting point of a figure is the first point in the sequence of connected lines and curves. 结束点是序列中的最后一个点。The ending point is the last point in the sequence. 几何形状基元的起始点和结束点由基元规范定义。The starting and ending points of a geometric shape primitive are defined by the primitive specification. 由一系列连接的直线和曲线（其起始点和结束点可能一致）组成的图形是开放图形，除非它是显式闭合的。A figure that consists of a sequence of connected lines and curves (whose starting and ending points may be coincident) is an open figure, unless it is closed explicitly. 可以通过使用 方法显式关闭图形，该方法通过将线条从结束点连接到起始点来关闭当前图形。A figure can be closed explicitly, by using the method, which closes the current figure by connecting a line from the ending point to the starting point. 由几何形状基元组成的图形是闭合图形。A figure that consists of a geometric shape primitive is a closed figure. 出于填充和剪裁目的（例如，如果使用 来呈现路径），将通过从图形的第一个点到最后一个点添加线条来关闭所有打开的图形。For purposes of filling and clipping (for example, if a path is rendered using ), all open figures are closed by adding a line from the figure's first point to its last point. 当创建路径或关闭图形时，将隐式启动一个新图形。A new figure is implicitly started when a path is created or when a figure is closed. 调用 方法时，将显式创建一个新图形。A new figure is explicitly created when the method is called. 将几何形状基元添加到路径时，它将添加一个包含几何形状的图形，并且还隐式启动一个新图形。When a geometric shape primitive is added to a path, it adds a figure containing the geometric shape, and also implicitly starts a new figure. 因此，在路径中始终有一个当前图形。Consequently, there is always a current figure in a path. 将直线和曲线添加到路径时，会根据需要添加隐式线条，以将当前图形的结束点连接到新直线和曲线的起点，以形成一系列连接的直线和曲线。When lines and curves are added to a path, an implicit line is added as needed to connect the ending point of the current figure to the starting point of the new lines and curves to form a sequence of connected lines and curves. 图有一个方向，该方向说明了如何在起始点和结束点之间跟踪线条和曲线段。A figure has a direction that describes how line and curve segments are traced between the starting point and the ending point. 方向定义为：直线和曲线添加到图形的顺序，或由几何形状基元定义。The direction is defined in the order that lines and curves are added to a figure, or is defined by the geometric shape primitive. 方向用于确定用于剪辑和填充的路径内部。The direction is used in determining the path interiors for clipping and fill.

summary.span: 向当前图形追加一段椭圆弧。

span.span: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图中有前面的行或曲线，则会添加一条线，以将上一段的端点连接到弧线的开头。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the beginning of the arc. 圆弧沿指定矩形所限定的椭圆的外围进行跟踪。The arc is traced along the perimeter of the ellipse bounded by the specified rectangle. 圆弧的起点是通过从椭圆的 x 轴（0度角）沿起始角度的度数顺时针度量来确定的。The starting point of the arc is determined by measuring clockwise from the x-axis of the ellipse (at the 0-degree angle) by the number of degrees in the start angle. 此终结点的定位方式类似于从起始点沿顺时针方向测量扫描角度的度数。The endpoint is similarly located by measuring clockwise from the starting point by the number of degrees in the sweep angle. 如果扫描角度大于360度或小于360度，则圆弧将分别扫描360度或-360 度。If the sweep angle is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, the arc is swept by exactly 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，其中定义了 arc。Creates a rectangle, from which the arc is defined. - 创建路径，`myPath`。Creates a path, `myPath`. - 定义从0度到180度扫描并将其追加到路径的180度椭圆弧。Defines a 180-degree elliptical arc that sweeps from 0 degrees to 180 degrees and appends it to a path. - 将路径绘制到屏幕上。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a cubic Bézier curve to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用第二个点和第三个点作为控制点，从第一个点到第四个点构造三次曲线。The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points. 如果图中有上一个直线段或曲线段，则将添加一条线，以将上一段的端点连接到三条曲线的起点。If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

param.name: points

span.span: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `points` 参数指定连接曲线的端点和控制点的数组。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves. 第一条曲线通过使用第二个点和第三个点作为控制点，从 `points` 数组中的第一个点构造。The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points. 除了前一条曲线的端点外，序列中的每个后续曲线还需要三个点：序列中的下两个点为控制点，第三个点为添加曲线的端点。In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve. 如果图中有前面的行或曲线，则会添加一条线，以将上一段的端点连接到序列中第一条立方曲线的起点。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个由七个点组成的数组（表示两个连接的贝塞尔曲线）。Creates an array of seven points (representing two connected Bézier curves). - 创建一个路径，并将一系列贝赛尔曲线点添加到该路径。Creates a path and adds the series of Bézier curve points to the path. - 将路径绘制到屏幕上。Draws the path to screen. span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户必须保留原始点（如果需要）。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始点在内部转换为三次 Bezier 控制点，因此没有用于返回原始点的机制。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果 `points` 数组中的第一个点和最后一个点不是同一点，则通过连接这两个点来结束曲线。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. 不能为此方法设置张力值，默认值为等效于0.5 的值。The tension value cannot be set for this method, and defaults to a value equivalent to 0.5. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

span.span: A value between from 0 through 1 that specifies the amount that the curve bends between points, with 0 being the smallest curve (sharpest corner) and 1 being the smoothest curve.

summary.span: 向此路径添加一个闭合曲线。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 由于曲线经过数组中的每个点，因此使用基数样条曲线。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户必须保留原始点（如果需要）。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始点在内部转换为三次 Bezier 控制点，因此没有用于返回原始点的机制。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果 `points` 数组中的第一个点和最后一个点不是同一点，则通过连接这两个点来结束曲线。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个包含六个点（表示基数样条）的数组。Creates an array of six points (representing a cardinal spline). - 创建一个路径，并将闭合基数样条曲线添加到该路径（从终结点到起始点）。Creates a path and adds the closed cardinal spline curves to the path (closed from the endpoint to the starting point). - 将路径绘制到屏幕上。Draws the path to screen. 请注意，使用张力为0.5。Notice that a tension of 0.5 is used. remarks.format: ## Remarks `points` 数组中的点指定多边形的顶点。The points in the `points` array specify the vertices of a polygon. 如果数组中的第一个点与最后一个点不同，则这两个点将连接以关闭多边形。If the first point in the array is not the same as the last point, those two points are connected to close the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建定义多边形的点的数组。Creates an array of points that defines a polygon. - 创建一个路径并将多边形添加到该路径。Creates a path and adds the polygon to the path. - 绘制屏幕的路径。Draws the path to the screen. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径和平移矩阵。Creates a graphics path and a translation matrix. - 使用四个点将曲线添加到路径。Adds a curve to the path using four points. - 使用黑色笔将路径（曲线）绘制到屏幕。Draws the path (curve) to the screen, using a black pen. - 将曲线向下移动10个像素，并对其进行平展。Shifts the curve down 10 pixels and flattens it. - 使用红笔将曲线绘制到屏幕。Draws the curve to the screen using, a red pen. 请注意，红色曲线具有连接点的平展线条。Notice that the red curve has flattened lines connecting the points. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 返回限定此 的矩形。

span.span: Returns a rectangle that bounds this .

returns.span: 一个 ，表示限定此 的矩形。

span.span: A that represents a rectangle that bounds this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的边框的大小受端端帽的类型、笔宽度和笔的斜接限制的影响，因此产生了对绑定路径的 "松动的"。The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path. 大致公式是：初始边界矩形被钢笔宽度放大，此结果乘以斜接限制，加上一些额外的边距来允许结束大写字母。The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 向其添加一个省略号（圆圈），并将其绘制到屏幕上。Adds an ellipse (circle) to it and draws it to the screen. - 使用调用 检索圆的边框，并将该矩形绘制到屏幕上。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the circle with a call to and draws the rectangle to the screen. - 创建第二个图形路径。Creates a second graphics path. - 添加一个圆圈，并将路径扩大到宽度10。Adds a circle and widens the path to a width of 10. - 绘制屏幕的路径。Draws the path to the screen. - 检索第二个圆圈的边框。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the second circle. - 将边框绘制到屏幕上。Draws the bounding rectangle to the screen. - 在对话框中显示矩形大小。Displays the rectangle size in a dialog box. 请注意，右侧的边框较大（用于说明线条的额外宽度）。Notice that the bounding rectangle on the right is larger (to account for the extra width of the line). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取 数组中相应点的类型。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的字节数组指定路径中数据点的点类型和标志。The array of bytes returned by the property specifies point types and flags for the data points in a path. 对于每个点，0到2位表示点的类型，位3到7保留一组指定点的属性的标志。For each point, bits 0 through 2 indicate the type of a point, and bits 3 through 7 hold a set of flags that specify the attributes of a point. 下表显示了可能的值及其含义。The following table shows possible values and their meanings. |值Value|含义Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |00|指示点是图形的起点。Indicates that the point is the start of a figure.| |11|指示点是行的两个终结点之一。Indicates that the point is one of the two endpoints of a line.| |33|指示点是三次贝塞尔曲线的端点或控制点。Indicates that the point is an endpoint or control point of a cubic Bézier spline.| |0x70x7|屏蔽除三个低序位之外的所有位，指示点类型。Masks all bits except for the three low-order bits, which indicate the point type.| |0x200x20|指定该点是一个标记。Specifies that the point is a marker.| |0x800x80|指定点是闭合子路径中的最后一个点（图）。Specifies that the point is the last point in a closed subpath (figure).|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在路径上创建可用于分隔路径部分的标记。This method creates a marker on the path that can be used to separate sections of the path. 然后，可以使用 方法遍历路径中的标记。You can then use the methods to iterate through the markers in the path. 标记用于分隔子路径组。Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths. 路径中的两个标记之间可以包含一个或多个子路径。One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers in the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码将创建一个路径，并将多个基元添加到由标记分隔的路径中，并将路径绘制到屏幕。The code creates a path and adds several primitives to the path separated by markers, and draws the path to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#26)]

summary.span: 不闭合当前图形即开始一个新图形。

span.span: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.

summary.span: 后面添加到该路径的所有点都被添加到此新图形中。

span.span: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户必须保留原始点（如果需要）。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始点在内部转换为三次 Bezier 控制点，因此没有用于返回原始点的机制。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 此方法在路径中启动一个新的子路径。This method starts a new subpath in the path. 子路径允许将路径分隔到各个部分，并使用 类来循环访问子路径。Subpaths allow you to separate a path into sections and use the class to iterate through the subpaths. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是为与 Windows 窗体一起使用而设计的，它需要 `e` 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径。Creates a path. - 添加两个图形集。Adds two sets of figures. 第一组图表将四个基元合并为两个图形。The first set of figures combines four primitives into two figures. 第二组插图合并了相同的四个基元（除了它们在 y 轴上的偏移量），并将其转换为三个图形。The second set of figures combines the same four primitives (except that they are offset in the y-axis) into three figures. - 将所有图形绘制到屏幕上。Draws all the figures to the screen. 请注意两个图形集之间的外观区别。Notice the difference in the appearance between the two sets of figures. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#27)]
